fields.name: Gateway not responding
fields.message: Error, no response.

fields.name: VID Not Supplied
fields.message: The Converge ID was not supplied in the authorization request.

fields.name: HTTP Trans Not Allowed
fields.message: HTTP POST transactions are not allowed for this account.

fields.name: HTTP Referrer Invalid
fields.message: HTTP POST transactions are not allowed for this HTTP Referrer.

fields.name: E-mail Address Invalid
fields.message: The e-mail address supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid.

fields.name: CVV2 Not Requested With Data
fields.message: The CVV2 indicator was not identified in the authorization request.

fields.name: CVV2 Requested But No Data
fields.message: The CVV2 request failed due to missing one or more pieces of required data.

fields.name: Required Field Not Supplied
fields.message: One or more required fields were not included.

fields.name: Invalid Transaction Type
fields.message: The authorization request included an invalid Transaction Type

fields.name: Receipt URL Missing
fields.message: The Receipt URL supplied in the authorization request appears to be blank or invalid.

fields.name: PIN Not Supplied
fields.message: The PIN was not supplied in the authorization request.

fields.name: Not Permitted
fields.message: This terminal or user ID is not permitted to process this transaction type.

fields.name: Permission Denied
fields.message: This account does not have permission to process # transactions.

fields.name: Time-Out
fields.message: The request has timed out. The allotted time to complete the request has ended. Please try again.

fields.name: Settlement is in progress
fields.message: Settlement is in progress, Void failed.

fields.name: User ID not supplied
fields.message: The User ID was not supplied in the authorization request.

fields.name: The system is unavailable
fields.message: The system is unavailable. Please try again later.

fields.name: Settlement is not allowed for this terminal
fields.message: Settlement is not allowed for this terminal.

fields.name: Invalid Credentials
fields.message: The credentials supplied in the authorization request are invalid.

fields.name: Credit Card Number Invalid
fields.message: The Credit Card Number supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid.

fields.name: Exp Date Invalid
fields.message: The Credit Card Expiration Date supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid.

fields.name: Amount Invalid
fields.message: The amount supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid.

fields.name: Approval Code/No Force
fields.message: This transaction supplied a Force Approval Code for a non-Force transaction

fields.name: Invalid Approval Code
fields.message: The Force Approval Code supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid or blank. The Force Approval Code must be 6 or less alphanumeric characters.

fields.name: Field Character Limit Exceeded
fields.message: The value for the # field is too long. You can enter # characters (maximum). Your entry contains # characters.

fields.name: Refund Amount Exceeds Limit
fields.message: The refund amount for this transaction ($#) may not exceed $#.

fields.name: Sales Tax Invalid
fields.message: The Sales Tax supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid.

fields.name: Invalid Surcharge Amount
fields.message: Invalid Surcharge amount for the PINless debit transaction.

fields.name: Invalid EGC Transaction type
fields.message: An invalid EGC Transaction type has been supplied with this request.

fields.name: Invalid EGC Tender Type
fields.message: An invalid EGC Tender type has been supplied with this request.

fields.name: Invalid Track Data
fields.message: The track data sent appears to be invalid.

fields.name: Invalid Track 2 data
fields.message: Transaction requires Track2 data to be sent.

fields.name: Missing Pin Data
fields.message: Transaction requires a PIN entry or encrypted PIN device.

fields.name: Invalid Voucher Number
fields.message: The value for the Voucher Number (ssl_voucher_number) field should be 15 digits in length. This value must be numeric.

fields.name: Invalid MICR Data
fields.message: The MICR Data sent appears to be invalid.

fields.name: MICR data and image mismatch
fields.message: The image uploaded doesn't match the MICR data sent for that check.

fields.name: Missing MAC value
fields.message: The MAC value sent appears to be incorrect.

fields.name: Minimum Length Error
fields.message: Minimum Field Character Limit not reached.

fields.name: Invalid Field
fields.message: The Field does not apply to this transaction type.

fields.name: Invalid CVV2 Value
fields.message: The value for the CVV2 (ssl_cvv2cvc2) field should be 3 or 4 digits in length. This value must be numeric.

fields.name: Invalid CVV2 Indicator Value
fields.message: The value for the CVV2 indicator (ssl_cvv2cvc2_indicator) field should be 1 Numeric Character only. Valid values are: 0, 1, 2, 9.

fields.name: Invalid card present indicator
fields.message: Card Present indicator sent is invalid.

fields.name: CashBack Amount Invalid
fields.message: The Cash back amount supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid.

fields.name: Invalid Key pointer
fields.message: The value for the key pointer (ssl_key_pointer) field should be 1 Character only. Valid value is: T for Triple-DES DUKPT.

fields.name: Invalid Billing cycle
fields.message: The billing cycle specified is not a valid entry.

fields.name: Invalid Payment date
fields.message: The next payment date specified is not a valid entry.

fields.name: Invalid installment number
fields.message: The installment number specified is invalid.

fields.name: Invalid recurring ID
fields.message: The recurring ID is not valid.

fields.name: Invalid installment ID
fields.message: The installment ID is not valid.

fields.name: Recurring Limit exceeded
fields.message: The recurring batch has exceeded the 20,000 transactions limit.

fields.name: Installment payments completed
fields.message: Installment payments completed.

fields.name: Invalid end of month value
fields.message: Invalid end of month value.

fields.name: Invalid half of month value
fields.message: Invalid half of month value.

fields.name: Half of month and next payment date combination mismatch
fields.message: The half of the month value provided [value] doesn't correspond with the next payment date of [value].

fields.name: Invalid Transaction ID
fields.message: Transaction ID is invalid for this transaction type.

fields.name: Exceeded the 10 minutes window
fields.message: Unable to void transaction, exceeds the 10mn window.

fields.name: Swipe data is not allowed for this market segment
fields.message: Swipe data is not allowed for this market segment. Please rekey the card data.

fields.name: End Of Month and Next Payment Date combination mismatch
fields.message: The end of the Month value provided [value] doesn't correspond with the next payment date of [value].

fields.name: Invalid tip
fields.message: Tip Amount is invalid.

fields.name: Missing response file name
fields.message: The response file name is missing. Please provide a response file name and try again.

fields.name: Invalid response file name
fields.message: The response file name is invalid. Please make sure the response file name doesn't contain any of the characters :\ / : * ? ' < > |

fields.name: Missing batch file
fields.message: The batch file is missing. Please make sure the file exists and try again.

fields.name: Invalid batch file name
fields.message: The batch file name you provided is too long. The file name cannot exceed 30 characters.

fields.name: Invalid batch file format
fields.message: The batch file you uploaded is invalid. Please make sure that the file is properly formatted.

fields.name: Invalid batch file extension
fields.message: The batch file you uploaded has an incorrect extension. Please make sure the file is in either CSV or XML format and try again.

fields.name: Import Batch in Progress, retry later
fields.message: Import Batch in Progress, retry later.

fields.name: File Exceeds Max Number of Transactions
fields.message: File Exceeds Max Number of Transactions.

fields.name: File already imported
fields.message: File already imported.

fields.name: Invalid fields in the batch file
fields.message: The batch file you uploaded is invalid. Please make sure that the file is properly formatted and file doesn't contain any (fieldname) field or values.

fields.name: Invalid response file length
fields.message: The response file name you provided is too long. The response file name cannot exceed 30 characters.

fields.name: Batch Import Limit exceeded
fields.message: The number of import batch files has exceeded the limit allowed within 24 hours.

fields.name: Invalid transaction type present in batch file
fields.message: The batch file you uploaded is invalid. Please make sure that the file contains valid and supported transaction types. For a complete list of all supported transaction types please consult manual.

fields.name: Error processing batch
fields.message: There was an error in processing your batch. If this issue persist please contact Technical Support at 1-800-377-3962, option 2 then option 2 (in Canada you are asked to choose either English or French for you language).

fields.name: Invalid Batch Import Request
fields.message: Only Multipart Form Data request are accepted.

fields.name: Signature already in System
fields.message: Transaction ID sent has a signature associated to it in the system.

fields.name: Signature format Invalid
fields.message: All signature images must be BASE64 encoded.

fields.name: Signature type Invalid
fields.message: Signature image type valid values (JPG, GIF, TIF, or PNG).

fields.name: Signature image exceeds size limitation
fields.message: Signature image exceeds the 10K size quota.

fields.name: Signature is not allowed for this market segment
fields.message: Signature is not allowed for this market segment.

fields.name: The MasterPass wallet is unavailable
fields.message: The MasterPass wallet is currently unavailable, please retry at later time.

fields.name: MasterPass is not setup for this terminal
fields.message: You must setup your terminal to accept MasterPass before sending this value.

fields.name: Values for ssl_3dsecure_value and ssl_xid are required
fields.message: Values for ssl_3dsecure_value and ssl_xid are required.

fields.name: Value for ssl_xid is required
fields.message: Value for ssl_xid is required.

fields.name: Invalid DBA name
fields.message: The DBA name cannot contain special characters and based on the DBA prefix setup for your terminal, this value cannot exceed 21 , 17 or 12 characters long.

fields.name: Invalid Token
fields.message: The token supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid.

fields.name: Invalid card information
fields.message: The card information supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid. You cannot provide both token and card number for processing.

fields.name: Transaction currency is not allowed for this terminal
fields.message: Transaction currency is not allowed for this terminal. You must be setup with Multi-Currency to specify a transaction currency.

fields.name: Transaction currency is not allowed for this Card Type
fields.message: In order to process Multi-Currency you must use either a Visa or a MasterCard, you can also process this card type in the merchant local currency.

fields.name: Invalid Transaction Currency
fields.message: The transaction currency sent is not correct. Please provide the correct 3-digit ISO code.

fields.name: Invalid BIN Override Value
fields.message: Invalid BIN Override Value.

fields.name: Invalid Amount
fields.message: The amount exceeds the original transaction amount.

fields.name: Invalid country code
fields.message: Invalid country code.

fields.name: Transaction Time Exceeded
fields.message: Transaction has timed out, you may retry at later time.

fields.name: Invalid Travel information
fields.message: The travel departure or completion dates specified are not valid. Dates should be formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and cannot be in the past.

fields.name: Invalid Search Criteria
fields.message: Too many search criteria were entered for this query. Modify the search and try again.

fields.name: Invalid Transaction Currency
fields.message: The currency sent doesn't match the original transaction currency.

fields.name: Missing Travel information
fields.message: The Departure Date and the Completion Date must be sent together.

fields.name: Invalid Transaction Currency
fields.message: The transaction currency sent is not supported for this terminal.

fields.name: Invalid Search Date
fields.message: Search dates must be formatted as MM/DD/YYYY or MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss AM/PM, the end date must be greater than the start date and the range cannot be greater than 31 days.

fields.name: Account Closed
fields.message: This account has been closed by Account Updater.

fields.name: MICR/Image Data is not allowed for this terminal
fields.message: MICR read or check image is not allowed for this terminal. Your terminal must be setup for ECS Paper Check.

fields.name: Keyed Check is not allowed for this terminal
fields.message: Key entered check is not allowed for this terminal. Your terminal must be setup for ACH ECheck.

fields.name: Invalid bank account type value
fields.message: The value for the check type (ssl_bank_account_type) field should be 1 Numeric Character only. Valid values are: 0 for Personal, 1 for Business.

fields.name: Invalid agreement indicator value
fields.message: The value for the agreement indicator (ssl_agree) field should be 1 Numeric Character only. Valid values are: 1 for Agree, 0 for Do not agree.

fields.name: Invalid Bank Account Number
fields.message: The bank account number supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid. The bank account number must numeric and up to 16 characters long.

fields.name: Invalid Bank Routing Number
fields.message: The bank routing number supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid. The bank routing number must be numeric fixed value of 9 characters.

fields.name: Invalid Check Number
fields.message: The Check number supplied in the authorization request appears to be invalid. The check number must be numeric.

fields.name: Missing check holder information
fields.message: The check information supplied in the request appears to be missing. You must provide first and last names for a personal check or a company name for a business check.

fields.name: Invalid Mobile indicator
fields.message: The mobile indicator appears to be missing or invalid.

fields.name: Invalid Merchant IP Address
fields.message: The IP Address appears to be missing or invalid.

fields.name: Email is not setup for this terminal
fields.message: Email is not setup for this terminal. You must enable the email options under the email setup form.

fields.name: Invalid POS, entry mode and card data combination
fields.message: POS entry and entry mode combination is invalid for this transaction.

fields.name: Invalid mobile source
fields.message: Invalid mobile source.

fields.name: EMV processing is not allowed for this card type.
fields.message: You can process this card type swiped or keyed.

fields.name: Swiped without fallback is not allowed
fields.message: Chip read must fail before fallback to swipe is allowed. You must attempt to insert card first.

fields.name: Signature is not allowed for this card
fields.message: Card verification method for this card does not require a signature

fields.name: Invalid Card Type.
fields.message: Transaction not supported with this card type.

fields.name: Invalid Search Transaction Type
fields.message: Transaction type provided in the request is not valid. Valid values are: SALE, VOID, FORCE.

fields.name: Invalid Search Amount
fields.message: The amount supplied in the search appears to be invalid. All amounts must be formatted correctly and max amount must be greater than the min amount if supplied.

fields.name: Invalid Search Card Type
fields.message: The card type supplied in the search appears to be invalid. Valid values are: CREDITCARD, DEBITCARD.

fields.name: Invalid Search Card Brand
fields.message: The card brand supplied in the search appears to be invalid. Valid values are: VISA, MC, JCB, DISC, AMEX.

fields.message: Transaction request was unable to be completed.

fields.message: Transaction amount exceeds the Gift Card balance amount.

fields.name: System is Temporarily Unavailable
fields.message: It appears that the system is temporarily unavailable. Please try your transaction again in a few minutes or contact the merchant you are trying to order from for further assistance. We apologize for this inconvenience.

fields.name: Invalid Request Format
fields.message: XML request is not well-formed or request is incomplete.

fields.name: Invalid Token Request
fields.message: The information supplied in the request is invalid. A token cannot be added unless one has been requested.
